description: Enterprise techniques used by Socksbot, ATT&CK software S0273 v1.1
name: Socksbot (S0273)

techniques.comment: Socksbot can write and execute PowerShell scripts.[1]
Socksbot can list all running processes.[1]
Socksbot creates a suspended svchost process and injects its DLL into it.[1]
Socksbot can start SOCKS proxy threads.[1]
